summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twelfth Avenue Northwest from a point three hundred (300) feet north of the north line of East Fifty-second Street to East Forty-fifth Street, in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 12899, creating Local Improvement District No. 1132 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
